headline: Assessing Aon (AON) Valuation After New Emerging Markets Climate Transition Fund Launch
summary: Aon (AON) is drawing investor attention after partnering with Irish Life Investment Managers on a €260m emerging markets climate transition fund, bringing Aon Ireland climate transition strategies to more than €1b in total investments. See our latest analysis for Aon. The climate transition fund launch comes as Aon’s $342.95 share price has seen a 2.99% 1 day share price return and a slightly weaker 30 day share price return of 3.80%. The 1 year total shareholder return of 7.09% contrasts...
